title: Sudden 30 ms increase in ping? Patch 7.17
body: Hi, ever since season 7 my ping has been increased from 47 to 61, which i have adapted to playing with. Patch 7.17 just hit and my ping is now 89-90 constantly? Not sure why this is and is frustrating since i will have to get used to a different ping. I live near Salt Lake City, Utah, not sure if anyone else is having issues like this.

replies.body: Same thing is happening to me. Constant 30 ms increase since the new patch, but i live in ohio.

Let's first make sure that your network is still configured in the best way, so go ahead and run through this little guide on [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), and if that's not helping at all do me a favor and run a quick trace route to our NA servers at 104.160.131.1 using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/).
